00018 /*
00019 ** Initialisation of the Application
00020 */
00021 bool clApp::OnInit(void)
00022 {
00023   // Create the main frame window
00024   clParentFrame* parentFrame = new clParentFrame((wxFrame *) NULL, -1, (char *) APP_NAME, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(800,600), wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE | wxHSCROLL | wxVSCROLL);
00025 
00026   // Refer to an application icon
00027 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00028   parentFrame->SetIcon(wxIcon("parent_icn"));
00029 #else
00030   parentFrame->SetIcon(wxIcon("gridLab_xpm"));
00031 #endif
00032 
00033   /*
00034   ** Show the main window
00035   */
00036   parentFrame->Centre(wxBOTH);
00037   parentFrame->Show(TRUE);
00038   SetTopWindow(parentFrame);
00039 
00040   return TRUE;
00041 }
